description.S1: Investigate Roseway to find potential company secrets that could be sold to the highest bidder through Gladys.
description.S2: Talking to the scientists around the town would probably be a good place to start.

blurb.B1: After landing at Roseway Landing Pad, you'll make your way through a desolate street and enter Roseway proper.
blurb.B2: If you speak with Orson Shaw and offer to help then you will get the objective to get a hold of his weapon plans.
blurb.B3: These can be found in the Storage Facility to the southeast of Roseway.
blurb.B4: Head to Roseway Communications Room and you can meet Anton Crane, who sent the distress call.
blurb.B5: He reveals that his work might not be entirely legal,
blurb.B6: so corporate cannot know of what has happened.
blurb.B7: You can intimidate (25) to get him to tell you what is going on.
blurb.B8: He's tasked with formulating new and improved dental gel,
blurb.B9: and they accidentally discovered an appetite suppresant.
blurb.B10: He claims a group of malcontents attacked them,
blurb.B11: freed the Raptidons and stole his research.
blurb.B12: You will get 3300xp for agreeing to help,
blurb.B13: and obtain Anton's Lab Keycard and Anton's Pass Code.
blurb.B14: He will also mention you should not kill the Raptidon mother,
blurb.B15: and that the old lab has Jameson, his protege.
blurb.B16: Agree to find him and you'll obtain the quest By His Bootstraps.

description.S1: Vaughn's semi-legal research would likely be valuable to Gladys.

blurb.B1: Near Cassandra through a door you'll find Vaughn's Research and the Unique Weapon: Rapti-prod.
blurb.B2: Use the terminal to determine what do with the data,
blurb.B3: but if you want it then you won't destroy it.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: You picked a hell of a day to visit. I'm Vaughn. Vaughn Cortes. Uh, Dr. Vaughn Cortes. But just Vaughn's fine. Really.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Where were you when the outlaws attacked?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Have you lived here long?

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Over in the main labs. I rabbited back here when I realized I was hearing gunshots, not blown fuses.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: We've been cooped up in here... I dunno, hours? Too long. I have to get back to - to work.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: No job's worth dying for.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You're dedicated to your work.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You look nervous.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Dr. Crane might say otherwise. Me? When those guys started shooting the place up, I was first out the door.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: I had to leave an experiment running at the lab. Something I've been working on a long while. Something that could really get me ahead. Know what I mean?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Not until you explain. Details, please.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Are we talking about something dangerous?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You want me to take care of it for you, of course.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Can't say as I do. Good day.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: I've been extracting organic compounds from raptidons. Compounds that have, uh, benefits.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: "...Benefits?"

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: In certain social situations. Personal situations. Where you might want to, uh, enhance your charisma.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You're going to have to be more specific.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Some people say rapt musk makes it easier to attract "companionship." Makes you more, uh, "appealing."

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Yeah, I really don't want to know any more. Cut to the chase.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: It's an aphrodisiac? Does it work?

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Sure. Of course. Our lab's south of here, down the road. Not the old public lab. The one past that, built into the mountainside.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Second lab down the road. And when I get there?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Anton told me about the other lab.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll bite. Why are there two labs?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Should you be telling me about this place?

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: My equipment's in the lower levels, way in the back. I have a big room all to myself. Dissection tables and whatnot.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: It should have been running this whole time. Just grab the results and bring them here.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: All right, I'll head up there and keep an eye out.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: So this stuff is valuable?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I don't want to get mixed up in this.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Great! This is really gonna save my ass.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: If you have a buyer. I got a contact who wants to haul the entire batch to Byzantium.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Help me out, I'll cut you in for a share. I'll even pay you before I am. When you deliver to me.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Yeah, I get it. It's just, there's sure to be some big corporate cleanup crew after this. They'll find my stuff.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: If you change your mind, I'll make it worth your time.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: See you around.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Uh, don't mention this to Anton, okay? He's kind of a tight-ass about the lab. Like, squeeze coal into diamond tight.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: The newer lab is built for, uh, more sensitive work. We mostly use the old lab for storage these days.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: No. But there are outlaws shooting it up. I'm guessing it hasn't been "secret" for a while.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: The results are outside the margin of error. Technically.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: No, no. Not unless you break the- But why would you? Let me explain.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Why? Are you heading to the lab? Because that would be-

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Sure. Loyal company fella. That's me. "Auntie Knows Best!"

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Look, I don't wanna go back out there, but there's a thing I got to do.

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: What? Uh. I mean... we're surrounded by hungry raptidons. Who wouldn't be? Am I right?

dialog.speaker: VaughnCortes (Male)
dialog.utterance: Sure. I guess. I'm not supposed to talk to-- I mean, why do you ask?
